name: String Slicing and Formatting
description: Demonstrate string slicing and f-string formatting.
instructions: Run the code to see string slicing and formatting.
starter:
text = 'Hello, Python!'
print('First 5 characters:', text[:5])
name = 'Alice'
greeting = f'Hello, {name}!'
print(greeting)

files./slice_and_format.py:
text = 'Hello, Python!'
print('First 5 characters:', text[:5])
name = 'Alice'
greeting = f'Hello, {name}!'
print(greeting)
